from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
lr = LinearRegression()
X = df[['Year']]
Y = df[['Population']]
model = lr.fit(X,Y)
Pred_X = pd.DataFrame(list(range(2021,2070)),columns=['Year'])
Pred_X['Prediction'] = model.predict(Pred_X[['Year']])
Pred_X
